title: Xbox error code 16 toolkit
description:
This toolkit contains two different apps needed to follow the instructions at the following link to repair an original X-Box that is failing from error code 16.


Follow the instructions in the xboxhdm folder to create a boot disk ISO AFTER you install Slayer\&#039;s Evox and (following instructions inside the slayersevox folder) move the necessary files from slayersevox to the appropriate folders inside the xboxhdm LINUX folders (C, D, E, etc.).

The letters represent different partitions on the xbox\&#039;s hard drive that will be \"rebuilt\" when you do the hotswap.

Hotswapping allows the xbox to unlock the hard drive, pulling the ide cable BEFORE the error screen prevents the xbox from relocking the drive.

You then rewrite the drive with the bootable disk then plug it back into the xbox for a reboot.  This locks the drive once again and your xbox has been rebuilt.

The tools inside can also be used to mod an xbox\&#039;s dashboard and many other things that I have no idea how to do.  I like things \"stock\" and don\&#039;t tend to fiddle too much.

Good luck and God bless!  I hope this torrent helps someone.
